column4: I'm trying out gpmc and im not sure how to get it to work, Its trying to connect to localhost, is this designed to pull music off a server and not be its own library?
what music player is good for library organization, but runs fast, rhythmbox runs pretty slow on my p4 with compiz on
You could try Amarok, the default music player for KDE. I always loved it.
AbhiJit: Well, it matters to the point where there's conflicts between the systems, though I never had anything that bad. You're free to uninstall everything KDE if/when you get intolerable problems.
